name: Adf.ly page monetarization
author: Carl-Philip HÃ¤nsch

sections.description: This plugin inserts the website entry script from adf.ly into your blog or website. With it you can earn money with each visitor of your page. Please be kind and use my referral link to register at adf.ly: http://adf.ly/?id=3757920
sections.installation:
• register at adf.ly under http://adf.ly/?id=3757920
  • activate the plugin
  • go to Settings -> Adfly
  • insert your adf.ly ID
  • have visitors on your site
  • get paid out by adf.ly
sections.faq:
Can I also use banners?

Yes, that was implemented in version 1.1.
sections.changelog:
1.2

Made compatible for newer wordpress versions

1.1

Added option for banner advertisement

1.0

initial working version
